website_summaries.verdict: The Under Armour Torch Fade is a great money-saving basketball shoe at $100. It boasts the Charged cushioning system that provides a decent ride and support. Though the shoe is designed for basketball, a lot of buyers prefer it for everyday use.If your gameplay is like that of a guard, then the Torch Fade is suited for you. Bigger players who require great impact absorption for their aggressive moves might not enjoy these Under Armour basketball shoes as much.
pros: The Charged cushioning system in the midsole of the Under Armour Torch Fade must have worked because many wearers claim that these Under Armour shoes are comfortable
According to a good number of buyers, the design and colorways of the shoe model are classy and dope
Many claim that this Under Armour shoe reminds them of the the Hyperdunk X of Nike
A lot of buyers appreciate the affordability of the Torch Fade
A huge number of users mention that the shoe is true to size
Several shoe owners say that these mid-top basketball shoes look better on hand than online
The outsole of the shoe is durable and really good for any sport, say a large number of buyers
The Under Armour Torch Fade is well-ventilated according to a large number of owners
Most reviewers love the stopping power of these UA basketball shoes
cons: A few wearers complain that the ankle area of the shoe causes blisters
Some users complain that the shoe attracts a lot of dust, causing it to easily lose traction
A small number of purchasers leave comments that these UA shoes need a few weeks to break in
The shoe model is not for aggressive players who need plenty of support and impact protection, say many buyers
Beastly players can opt for the 6th Stephen Curry sneakers
A couple of owners report that some lace loops of the shoe broke after just a few uses

customer_reviews.title: Very thin and light material
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Looks nice and fits well. Feels fine on the court, has good traction, and decent cushion. The material seems thinner and lighter than any shoes I've bought in the past; lighter feels good for performance, I just hope it doesn't wear down quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice shoes. My son picked them out after scrolling through many under armour sneakers as he finds them to be the most comfortable. They look even nicer in person and says they fit well. The only downside was that they were priced higher than many of the other under armour shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for the gym if you have narrow feet and your heels are constantly slipping out of regular cross trainers.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, Fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift, and they fit my boyfriend perfectly. They look nicer than the picture, and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: gcc

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12yo little brother and he loves it over this expensive Jordans. He states it's more comfortable and he's able to be more active without feeling like his feet are sore. I'm purchasing another pair for this school year.
customer_reviews.author: Moya Fireworks

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: Love the look, they run true to size, but my husband says they rub his heel area, may just need to lace them differently or wait till they break in a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, but kind of thin quality material on the sides and a little narrow in the toe area.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting shoe but discontinued
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Its discontinued so they are very hard to find. Not sure why UA stopped making this one. My favorite yet.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Horse

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Love the color.. I would suggest buying a size bigger as they run small. I had to wear them casually before I used them for cardio and outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.author: Werewolfinme

customer_reviews.title: I have had many UA Shoes before and these just ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had many UA Shoes before and these just look cheap. They run at least a size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was not as comfortable as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Shoe string holder tore through when lacing. Send them ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoe string holder tore through when lacing. Send them back and ordered another pair which arrived promptly and saved the day. The second pair did not have this problem, thank goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Stockton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's really great, I like it very much! This is a great shopping experience!
customer_reviews.author: Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son, tried to steal them from him. Wasnt happening!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R Burkeen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Uncomfortable. Top of shoe is stiff and gives blisters above ankle. Feels cheaply made
customer_reviews.author: Jason Russell Rider

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe that didn't require a lot of breaking in before playing in an outdoor basketball league.
customer_reviews.author: Dandi_lion

customer_reviews.title: small sizing
customer_reviews.text: really nice basketball shoes but my normal size was a little tight in these, i ended up returning them and buying at a store i could try them on at
customer_reviews.author: Julia T

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't beat it excellent quality most importantly i have wide feet would highly ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price you can't beat it excellent quality most importantly i have wide feet would highly recommend going a half size up very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Need a sneaker that dint constrict my workout while wearing my ankle brace. Its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Dream Queen

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my ankles!
customer_reviews.text: See the pic. The shoe is tough in the internal surface and it hurts my ankles. Be cautious about this and do wear long sock to protect your ankles!
customer_reviews.author: KUN LIU

customer_reviews.title: The perfect birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shoes for my son for his birthday. He was thrilled to receive them. He said that they fit like they were made for him. He is considering getting another pair in a different color .
customer_reviews.author: RENEE

customer_reviews.title: We bought the exact same size of the exact same ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the exact same size of the exact same shoe we already own and wear and these were way too tight.
customer_reviews.author: C.Schottler

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Torch Fade Basketball Shoes
product_meta.description: These torch fade shoes from Under Armour feature lightweight leather upper with molded foam heel and forefoot to provide comfort and structure that moves with the foot. They also feature mesh tongue that offers increased breathability and a better fit. They have molded toe cap for added protection and durability. The sock liner is made out of eva. Charged cushioning midsole absorbs impact and converts it into a level of responsive comfort. One-piece solid rubber outsole with herringbone traction pattern throughout provides lateral/linear movement and control.
feature_bullets: Moulded toe cap - For added protection.
Charged Cushioning - For a responsive ride.
Solid rubber outsole - Provides exceptional lateral/linear movement.
